participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and a bit quirky, Ethan enjoys outdoor activities and has a deep appreciation for nature.
participant_1.background: I remember the smell of my grandmother's house. I broke my nose when I was ten. To stay in shape, I chase cheetahs at the zoo. I like to skateboard. I don’t much like TV.

participant_2.name: Maya
participant_2.personality: Creative and slightly clumsy, Maya has a passion for art and enjoys engaging with the ocean's beauty.
participant_2.background: I am a personal shopper who paddle boards on my days off. I remember reading my favorite comic books at home before going to bed. I'm so clumsy that I even trip over my own feet sometimes. I am not a big fan of waiting in line. I build aquariums for a living.

content.text: Hi
Hey there
What are your hobbies?
I build aquariums for a living and I like to paddleboard on my days off
That's really neat, how did you get into aquarium building?
I love fish and the ocean so it was a natural fit
Do you have any fish tanks at home?
I have a saltwater tank with a clown fish and a few other fish
I like saltwater fish but I've never had a tank
They can be a lot of work but they're so beautiful
What's your favorite part about your job?
I love being able to create something beautiful and that people can enjoy
That's really nice, I'm sure you're very good at it
Thank you, I try my best
I'm sure you do. What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to go paddleboarding and read comic books
I've never been paddleboarding but it looks like fun
It's really fun and a great way to get exercise
I'll have to try it sometime. I like to read comic books too, what are some of your favorites?
I like Marvel comics a lot
Me too! I'm a big fan of Spider-Man
He's my favorite superhero
He's mine too
We should be friends
I'd like tha
